attributes.action: make Piccadilly line trains stop at Turnham Green underground station throughout the day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Turnham Green Underground Station is a busy station throughout the day and although it has access to the District Line and the Piccadilly line, only District line trains stop there unless it is very early in the morning or very late at night. If this frustrates you, and you would like to see at least some of the numerous Piccadilly line trains stop at Turnham Green Station during the day as well, sign this petition.

rejection.details: This is a matter for TfL, who fall within the remit of the Mayor of London rather the central Governmemt.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
